name: indian-stock-sense
description: Full stack application for analyzing Indian stock market data

scripts.dev: npm run backend & npm run frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.build:backend: cd backend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.export: cd frontend && npm run export || echo 'Export not supported in newer Next.js versions'
scripts.build:all: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.clean: cd frontend && npm run clean && cd ../backend && rm -rf dist
scripts.install:submodules: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.render:build: npm run install:all && npm run build:all
